column1: Funeral services will be held at 2:00 p.m. on Wednesday
column2: June 17th at Glenwood Lutheran Church in Glenwood.  Visitation will be from noon until the time of the service at the church.  Inurnment will be at a later date at Dawn Valley Cemetery in Bloomington
column3: MN. Arrangements are with the Hoplin-Hitchcock Funeral Home in Glenwood.
